bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Authorizes a named individual to purchase at fair market value specified Federal real property in Grant County, New Mexico, to which such individual's mineral patent application applies. Directs the Bureau of Land Management to enter into negotiations with such individual for the purchase of such property.
